## Functions

### LLVMCreateModuleProviderForExistingModule() {#ga0b2ca68b2b723cae9818dffe35f32408}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMModuleProviderRef LLVMCreateModuleProviderForExistingModule (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gad1d1bb5f901c903a0cf09c5a053c9c56">LLVMModuleRef</a> M)</>}>
Changes the type of M so it can be passed to FunctionPassManagers and the JIT.

They take ModuleProviders for historical reasons.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h/#l04722">4722</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h">Core.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp/#l04484">4484</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp">Core.cpp</a>.
